root.name: Bachelor Party
root.description: Bachelor Party is a pornographic Breakout clone developed and released for the Atari 2600 by adult games developer Mystique. The paddle used to bounce balls off of is something that vaguely resembles a penis and testicles while the ball has been replaced a very naked, very horny, very pixelated man. The goal of the game is to use the paddle to bounce the man into the naked women; when all the women have been hit, the game has been won.A variant of the game, Bachelorette Party, uses a woman as the ball and the objective is to hit naked men.
